metadata.title: Aphrodisiac: Best of
description: 21 Track Collection of the RCA Hit Singles and Top Album Tracks, plus Many 12" Mixes. Tracks Include I Want Candy, Rikki Dee, Quiver, Prince of Darkness and Much More.
